title: Zahřívání: Scott Green z 3D Systems diskutuje o potenciálu 3D tisku v odvětví datových center
summary: The relentless rise of NVIDIA, the steadily increasing pledges of major private and public investments in national infrastructure projects around the world, and the general cultural obsession with AI have...
source: 3DPrint.com | The Voice of 3D Printing / Additive Manufacturing
title_en: Heating Up: 3D Systems’ Scott Green Discusses 3D Printing’s Potential in the Data Center Industry
summary_bullets_en: Scott Green from 3D Systems explores the role of 3D printing in enhancing data center infrastructure.
The integration of 3D printing could lead to more efficient cooling systems and customized components.
The growing interest in AI and infrastructure investments is driving innovation in data center technologies.
summary_bullets_cs: Scott Green z 3D Systems zkoumá roli 3D tisku při zlepšování infrastruktury datových center.
Integrace 3D tisku by mohla vést k efektivnějším chladicím systémům a přizpůsobeným komponentům.
Rostoucí zájem o AI a investice do infrastruktury pohánějí inovace v technologiích datových center.

title: Toyota za 33 miliard USD: Privatizace a agilita
summary:
Charles R. Goulding and Aaron Rofe break down Toyota Group’s bold move to privatize Toyota Industries and double down on 3D printing-driven efficiency.

The post Toyota’s US$33B Power Play: Going Private, Going Agile appeared on Fabbaloo.
title_en: Toyota’s US$33B Power Play: Going Private, Going Agile
summary_bullets_en: Toyota Group is privatizing Toyota Industries to enhance operational agility.
The company is investing heavily in 3D printing to boost efficiency.
This strategic move involves a US$33 billion investment.
The focus is on leveraging advanced manufacturing technologies for competitive advantage.
summary_bullets_cs: Toyota Group privatizuje Toyota Industries pro zvýšení provozní agility.
Společnost výrazně investuje do 3D tisku pro zvýšení efektivity.
Tento strategický krok zahrnuje investici ve výši 33 miliard USD.
Zaměřuje se na využití pokročilých výrobních technologií pro konkurenční výhodu.

title: Nový patent IBM na budovy navržené ve VR pro 3D tisk
summary: New York-based IT multinational International Business Machines Corporation (IBM) has patented a method for designing 3D printed buildings in virtual reality (VR).  The document (US12340150B2) was originally filed in June 2021 and published in December 2022. Last week, the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) granted the patent, meaning it is now legally enforceable.     […]
title_en: New IBM Patent Granted for VR-Designed 3D Printed Buildings
summary_bullets_en: IBM has been granted a patent for a method to design 3D printed buildings using virtual reality.
The patent, filed in June 2021, was published in December 2022.
The United States Patent and Trademark Office granted the patent last week, making it legally enforceable.
summary_bullets_cs: IBM získalo patent na metodu navrhování budov pro 3D tisk pomocí virtuální reality.
Patent byl podán v červnu 2021 a publikován v prosinci 2022.
Minulý týden byl patent udělen Úřadem pro patenty a ochranné známky Spojených států, což znamená, že je nyní právně vymahatelný.

title: Bioinženýrské ostrůvky si udržují tvar a funkci s 90% životaschopností v průlomu 3D tisku
summary: Secure your spot now for exclusive AM insights at our Additive Manufacturing Advantage online conference covering aerospace, space, and defense. Researchers at Wake Forest University and University of Miami have developed a way to 3D print insulin-producing human islets using a bioink made from alginate and decellularized pancreatic tissue. The work was presented at the ESOT Congress […]
title_en: Bioengineered islets retain shape and function with 90% viability in 3D printing breakthrough
summary_bullets_en: Researchers at Wake Forest University and University of Miami have developed a method to 3D print insulin-producing human islets.
The bioink used is made from alginate and decellularized pancreatic tissue.
The breakthrough was presented at the ESOT Congress.
The development promises significant advancements in bioengineering and diabetes treatment.
summary_bullets_cs: Výzkumníci z Wake Forest University a University of Miami vyvinuli metodu pro 3D tisk lidských ostrůvků produkujících inzulín.
Použitý bioinkoust je vyroben z alginátu a dekomponované pankreatické tkáně.
Tento průlom byl představen na kongresu ESOT.
Vývoj slibuje významný pokrok v bioinženýrství a léčbě diabetu.

title: 07-01-2017: BlackBelt úspěšně dokončil svou kampaň na Kickstarteru, čímž vytvořil trend pro 3D tiskárny s dopravníkovým pásem
summary: The 3D printer stood out for its innovative use of a conveyor belt moving in the Y axis
title_en: 07-01-2017: BlackBelt has completed its successful Kickstarter campaign, creating a trend for conveyor belt 3D printers
summary_bullets_en: BlackBelt successfully completed its Kickstarter campaign.
The 3D printer features an innovative conveyor belt moving in the Y axis.
This design sets a new trend in the 3D printing industry.
summary_bullets_cs: BlackBelt úspěšně dokončil svou kampaň na Kickstarteru.
3D tiskárna se vyznačuje inovativním použitím dopravníkového pásu pohybujícího se v ose Y.
